items.content_html: Grocery List App This is a lightweight web application for managing your grocery list. Users can add, remove, and mark items as completed. The app utilizes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend and stores data locally to maintain the list across sessions.
items.title: Keerthanas72/grocery-list: Grocery List App This is a lightweight web application for managing your grocery list. Users can add, remove, and mark items as completed. The app utilizes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the frontend and stores data locally to maintain the list across sessions.
